<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.scripted_rest_services.errors" name="Scripted REST APIs - Error types" state="published" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" namespace="sn_ws_err"> <description>An internal plugin component to Scripted REST APIs.</description>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServiceError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableServiceError"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="BadRequestError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableBadRequestError"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NotAcceptableError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableNotAcceptableError"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UnsupportedMediaTypeError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableUnsupportedMediaTypeError"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ConflictError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableConflictError"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="NotFoundError" class="com.glide.rest.service.custom.errors.ScriptableNotFoundError"/> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>An internal plugin component to Scripted REST APIs.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.scripted_rest_services.errors</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Scripted REST APIs - Error types</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.scripted_rest_services.errors/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>de.scripted_rest_services.errors</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
